content: *k2tog* to end of round you should have 8 stitches left cut the yarn leaving a 6 tail thread the long tail onto a needle and slip the 8 remaining stitches onto the thread pull tight and sew over the little hole at the top a few times weave in the loose ends on the wrong side and you re done pattern copyright littletheorem do not reproduce in full or in part without the author s written permission more patterns from littletheorem northumbria bellahouston sweater dress moseley cardigan dipped mitts epsilon cardigan asphodel shawl sineabhar shawl felted lace wrap
